simplified: 马无夜草不肥，人无外快不富

pronunciation.pinyin: mǎ wú yè cǎo bù féi , rén wú wài kuài bù fù
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ma3 wu2 ye4 cao3 bu4 fei2 , ren2 wu2 wai4 kuai4 bu4 fu4

details.simplified: 马无夜草不肥，人无外快不富
details.traditional: 馬無夜草不肥，人無外快不富

meanings.value: a horse cannot get fat without an extra ration, a man cannot get rich without an extra income
